cs.IT, cs.DS, cs.CC, cs.SI, cs.LG. 

The paper deals with a source coding problem, which is a topic in information theory (cs.IT). The problem involves encoding sparse sequences, which is a topic in data structures (cs.DS). The paper also discusses connections to communication complexity, which is a topic in theoretical computer science (cs.CC). The use of local decodability constraints suggests a focus on error-correcting codes, which is a topic in signal processing and machine learning (cs.SI). Finally, the paper derives upper and lower bounds, which is a topic in machine learning and optimization (cs.LG).
